Njarabi – The African Dating App

Njarabi is the African dating app that puts clarity and sincerity at the heart of every interaction.
Whether you are looking for marriage, a serious relationship, genuine friendship, or a casual fling, Njarabi helps you state your intentions from the start for real and unambiguous encounters.

Why choose Njarabi

Clear intentions: marriage, love, friendship, flirting

Authentic encounters with real and verified profiles

Smooth conversations with secure and intuitive messaging

Smart notifications to stay connected to the right opportunities

Designed for Africa with a modern design rooted in our values

More than just a dating app

Njarabi is more than a dating platform. It is an open and respectful community where everyone can find their place, whether it is to build a lasting relationship or share lighter moments.

Download Njarabi now and enjoy encounters that suit you.

Discover Heyama, the exclusive dating app for the African community. We are proud to present an innovative platform that celebrates the traditions, customs, and cultural richness of Africa.

CUSTOMIZED NDOLO SEARCH

Are you tired of swiping endlessly without finding someone who shares your African origins and culture? With Heyama and its innovative algorithm, take advantage of the NDOLO feature that allows you to connect with profiles that share your origins, culture, customs, local dishes, mother tongue, and more.

How it works:

Step 1: Post an ad introducing yourself and describing your ideal partner.

Step 2: Our algorithm recommends your profile to community members who best match your criteria.

Step 3: You are connected with up to 10 profiles, and it's time to make your move!


PERSONALIZED MENTORING TO NOURISH YOUR RELATIONSHIP

If you connect with a community member and are unsure how to nurture the relationship, we provide exclusive advice from our relationship coaches to assist you.


ENJOY GOOD TIMES IN A SAFE ENVIRONMENT

Safety is our top priority at Heyama. We automatically verify user photos to ensure you are engaging with the person depicted in their profile picture. You can trust that each profile you encounter on our platform has been carefully verified.

Furthermore, we offer reporting tools and a dedicated moderation team to promptly address any inappropriate behavior. Any individual reported by our members will be permanently and irrevocably excluded from Heyama.

Welcome to the Okalm iOS User App - Your Ultimate Companion for Hassle-Free Services!

Discover a world of convenience with the Okalm iOS User App. Whether you need a ride, a quick delivery, or to shop for your favorite products, we've got you covered. Say goodbye to everyday hassles and embrace a seamless service experience like never before.

Effortless Ride Booking:
Need a taxi or a motorcycle for a ride? Look no further! With Okalm, booking a ride is a breeze. Simply enter your pick-up and drop-off locations, choose your vehicle type, and get ready for a smooth journey. Our reliable drivers will get you to your destination safely and on time.

Convenient Delivery Services:
From delicious meals to essential supplies, Okalm has your delivery needs covered. Place your orders in a few taps, and our trusted delivery partners will bring them right to your doorstep. Say goodbye to long queues and let Okalm handle your deliveries.

Shop and Get it Delivered:
Shop for groceries, pharmaceuticals, beauty products, and more from your favorite stores with the Okalm iOS User App. Pick your items, check out, and have them delivered to your home hassle-free. Enjoy the ultimate shopping experience with Okalm.

Parcel Delivery Made Easy:
Sending or receiving parcels has never been simpler. Use Okalm's efficient parcel delivery service to send or receive packages to any address in Ouaga. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your parcels are in safe hands.

All-in-One Platform:

Okalm offers a comprehensive range of services:
1. Purchase and delivery of products, including groceries, pharmaceuticals, technology, beauty, and more.
2. Parcel delivery with motorcycles, tricycles, vans, and trucks.
3. Transportation services for cars and motorcycles, as well as car and motorcycle rentals.
All these services, available at your fingertips. Choose what you need and let Okalm take care of the rest.

Easy Payment Options:
With Okalm, paying for services is a breeze. Choose from multiple payment options, including in-app payments and cash on delivery. Your transactions are safe and secure, giving you peace of mind.

Real-time Tracking:
Track your ride or delivery in real-time with Okalm's innovative tracking feature. Know exactly where your driver or delivery partner is and stay informed every step of the way.

User-Friendly Interface:
Okalm's intuitive and user-friendly interface ensures a seamless experience. Navigate effortlessly, browse services, and place orders with ease. The app's simplicity makes it suitable for users of all ages.

Safety First:
At Okalm, your safety is our top priority. All our drivers and delivery partners undergo rigorous background checks and follow safety protocols. Travel and receive deliveries with confidence, knowing you're in safe hands.

Customer Ratings and Reviews:
Your feedback matters! Rate your drivers, delivery partners, and service providers to help us maintain the highest standards of service. Your reviews also help fellow users make informed decisions.

24/7 Customer Support:
We're here for you around the clock. Our dedicated support team is ready to assist you with any queries or concerns. Count on us for prompt and reliable support whenever you need it.

Download the Okalm iOS User App now and experience the convenience of seamless service at your fingertips. Let Okalm transform your daily life with effortless rides, deliveries, and shopping. Embrace the future of service with Okalm!

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is your comprehensive Islamic companion, designed to support your daily spiritual journey. With essential features like accurate prayer time reminders, Azkar collection, and Qibla direction, it helps strengthen your faith and manage your daily worship seamlessly.

Key Features:

* Accurate Prayer Times: Never miss a prayer again! Get precise notifications for all Salah times (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on your location.
* Azkar & Duas: Immerse yourself in spiritual invocations with a curated collection of Azkar and Duas, perfect for morning, evening, and every moment in between. Strengthen your connection with Allah through heartfelt invocations.
* Tasbih Counter: Elevate your Dhikr practice with the built-in Tasbih Counter. This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer bead counter to help you track your count while reciting your prayer or Dua.
* Qibla Direction: Find the Qibla direction accurately, no matter where you are. The integrated Qibla compass ensures precise alignment for your prayers.
* Quran Access: Read and reflect on the Holy Quran directly within the app. The clear and user-friendly interface allows for easy navigation between chapters and verses, supporting your daily recitation goals.
* Prayer Reminders: Never miss a prayer with customizable reminders that fit your routine. Whether it's a gentle nudge for Fajr or a midday reminder for Dhuhr, you'll stay connected to your worship schedule.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is designed to be your trusted spiritual companion, integrating faith seamlessly into your daily routine. Whether you're managing prayer times, reflecting on Quranic verses, or seeking solace in Azkar and Duas, this app supports your spiritual growth and devotion.

Download now and experience the convenience, guidance, and fulfillment of having a complete Islamic companion right at your fingertips. Stay connected to your faith, no matter where life takes you.
“今点汉寿”客户端是汉寿县委、县政府适应新媒体发展潮流，利用湖南日报社开发建设的“新湖南云”数据资源和技术支持，提供新闻资讯、政务服务、生活服务于一体的官方客户端。“今点汉寿”综合应用文字、图片、视频、H5等多媒体手段，打造全新融媒体产品，力图传播汉寿县声音，展现汉寿县形象，彰显汉寿县魅力。“今点汉寿”将成为发布汉寿政策的主平台、获取汉寿信息的主渠道、对外讲述并传播汉寿建设成就的新窗口。

Easy Translate - AI Translate uses advanced AI to translate text, speech, images, and dialogues, plus a ChatGPT-style AI assistant and a daily phrase learning feature to help you speak with confidence.

Key Features:
Text Translation - Type or paste text and get fast, accurate translations across many languages.
Voice Translation - Speak naturally and hear or view real-time translations for smooth conversations.
Image Translation - Translate text from photos or camera captures using built-in OCR.
Dialogues Translation - Real-time bilingual conversations that keep your dialogue flowing.
AI ChatGPT-style Conversation - Interact with an intelligent AI assistant for practice, explanations, and language guidance.
Daily Phrases - A new practical phrase every day with examples to help you use it in real life.

AI-powered translations that are quick and reliableIntuitive, user-friendly interface for travel, study, and work.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

Alipay is a leading open platform for payments and digital services in China.

Users with a Chinese ID and bank account can use Alipay to make payments online and in person at various merchants outside of China as they travel for leisure, business, or study. 

Foreign visitors to China can connect their credit card to take advantage of Alipay’s widespread acceptance by tens of millions of merchants across the country. Alipay is not designed or intended for use by foreign users in their home country or anywhere outside of China.

Boost your dating confidence with Badoo— the dating app that makes it easy to express your true self.
 
It’s an encouraging, safe space that’s designed to help you make more meaningful connections.
 
How? By keeping it simple, helping you take action with confidence, and giving you the features and support you need to find whatever you’re searching for. Whether that’s dates, a long-term relationship, new friends, or chats.

Plus, with our latest tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, you can say hello to a fun and authentic dating experience. 
 
Download Badoo to take your dating confidence to another level."

Back yourself
On Badoo, it’s all about celebrating you and staying true to your needs. With our various features, it’s easy to put yourself out there with confidence.
Trust your experience
Badoo is a platform that prioritises authenticity. Profile photos can be verified and there are strict user guidelines in place.

How Badoo works
Focusing on who you are and what you want, here are some features making it easier for you to meet your kind of people:  
-Advanced Filters: Finesse your search, and save your time
-Profile Questions: Easily champion your personality
- People Nearby: Meet daters around you
- Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right to connect and left for skip
- Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling
- Verified profiles: We have a three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends
- Blur intimate photos: Using AI, our Private Detector feature detects explicit photos and will let you decide if you want to view or block the image
- Deception Detector: Our new tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, so you can have a fun and authentic dating experience"

Go Premium
Maximise your dating experience. When you upgrade to Badoo Premium, you’ll unlock plenty of features that will make it even easier to find meaningful connections:

- See who's already liked you
- Find exactly what you’re looking for with unlimited Advanced Filters
- Get your messages read first
- Send unlimited likes
 - Control who sees your profile with Invisible Mode
- Undo accidental left swipes  
- And much more...

The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Badoo Premium is flexible and adapts to your needs - you can cancel your subscription at any time.
 
For more information, read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://www.badoo.com/privacy
https://badoo.com/terms

Revolutionizing Entertainment Discovery with Conversational AI

PipeCalc AI transforms how audiences find and enjoy movies and TV. Instead of static genre lists, our platform introduces Sage, a conversational AI that understands mood, context, and personal taste. Tell Sage about your perfect evening, current vibe, or favorite themes and receive recommendations that feel natural and uniquely tailored.

What Makes PipeCalc AI Different

Conversational Cinema Intelligence
Sage doesn’t just filter data—it chats with you, turning discovery into a human-like conversation and delivering suggestions that cross typical category lines.

Multi-Layer Discovery

Sage (AI Chat): Context-aware movie guide.

Voyager: Curated collections such as Cinema Magnetism for trending hits and Narrative Mastery for critic favorites.

Vault: Smart watchlist with cross-platform sync.

Nexus: Central hub for personal preferences.

Distinctive Design

Our Cinematic Glassmorphism interface pairs a rich dark theme with soft blue highlights to reduce eye strain. Proprietary gradients, spring-physics animations, and glass-effect overlays create depth and elegance, while professional SF-Symbol icons and a floating tab bar keep navigation clean and modern.

Intelligent Curation

PipeCalc AI’s algorithms highlight what matters now:

Today’s Pulse: Real-time trending analysis.

Weekly Obsessions: Predictive picks from social buzz.

Series Zeitgeist: Tracks shows shaping culture.

Context-aware genre filters for precise results.

Fair & Flexible Access

Our credit system makes premium AI free to explore: watch optional ads to earn credits—no mandatory subscription. This ethical model supports development while respecting user choice.

Platform-Neutral Recommendations

PipeCalc AI integrates with major streaming services and shows only content you can actually watch, eliminating the frustration of unavailable titles.

Built for Privacy & Performance

Developed in SwiftUI and powered by the OpenRouter API plus TMDB’s database, PipeCalc AI offers:

Local caching for smooth offline browsing.

End-to-end encryption of user preferences.

Zero personal data collection beyond anonymous metrics.

Why It Belongs on the App Store

PipeCalc AI is more than a TMDB wrapper:

Unique Interaction: Conversational AI that understands context, not just keywords.

Original Visual Style: A fully custom cinematic aesthetic.

Proprietary Curation: Exclusive naming and content groupings.

Ethical Monetization: Credit system keeps AI access inclusive.

Thoughtful Experience: From onboarding to daily use, every detail is designed for enjoyment.

Who It’s For

Cinephiles seeking deep discovery and hidden gems.

Casual Viewers wanting quick, mood-based picks.

Families needing age-appropriate suggestions.

International Users with multi-language support and regional awareness.

Roadmap for Innovation

Coming features include advanced mood detection, social watch parties, AR poster scanning, voice navigation, and collaborative watchlists.

PipeCalc AI isn’t just another movie list app—it’s a new way to experience stories. By combining advanced AI, striking design, and user-first values, we’re redefining entertainment discovery one conversation at a time.

Phone Tracker - Family Locator is an application that uses GPS technology to help you locate and keep track of your family members, friends, and loved ones in real-time on a live, private map. With Circles, you can create a group of people who share their locations within the group, so you can easily track their location history and current location. Invite members by sharing a unique, private 6-digit number, and once they accept the invitation, you can locate them on the map at any time.

The app also includes geofence zones, which allow you to know when any of your circle members enter or leave a certain area by creating a location-based boundary. You can drop a pin on the map to set the center of the geofence at a specific location, name your geolocation, set the radius for it, and get push notifications when someone enters or exits it. This feature can help you ensure that your loved ones are safe by automatically letting you know their whereabouts, without any effort from them.

In case of emergencies, the app includes an SOS function that sends an urgent push notification to all members of your circle when you tap on the SOS button, along with a live update of your location. This feature ensures that your child, partner, or friend can alert you any time they need help or are in danger.

Other features of the app include the ability to view the location history of each circle member, find a lost device using the GPS phone tracker, and manage group circles and geofence zones.

Phone Tracker is your reliable GPS-based family locator and personal tracking app, designed to help keep your loved ones safe. It is not intended for spying or secret surveillance, and it cannot be installed remotely or without consent. To use the service, the user must install the app manually and approve the location-sharing request. By subscribing you can enjoy unlimited alerts, real-time tracking, extended location history and many more features!

Browse the flirt gallery and see who likes you or visited your profile. 

// Go on a live video date today:
More than just your classic dating app: Start a speed date with ‘next|date’ and decide if it’s a match and if you’d like to schedule the next date. Before you interact in a chat or in Match, a blind date lets you score points for your personality, humor and voice. 

// Better than TV – LOVOO Live: 
Meet different personalities in live streams and live chats. Give entertaining streamers virtual gifts or start your own show. Friends and couples have also found each other here. 
 
// A safe place for lighthearted flirting: 
Fakes and scams have no place on LOVOO. Policies and procedures are in place to ensure your safety when meeting new people. You can report inappropriate behavior, suspicious profiles, etc. at any time.

More information is available in the Terms of Use (https://about.lovoo.com/en/support/legal/terms-conditions-translationsource/) and Privacy Policy (https://about.lovoo.com/en/support/legal/trls-privacy-policy-live-translation-source/).

The world’s largest free social styling & wardrobe app (9 M+ users). Built to help you love your wardrobe.
“Revolutionised the way I dress and shop” – Vogue. Also loved by The New York Times,  BBC,  The Guardian,  The Drew Barrymore Show + 100s more.

We’re reprogramming our relationship with fashion – helping you organise your wardrobe to gain personal insights and inspiration. See what you own, what you wear and how you wear it, giving you the freedom to style your way while reclaiming your love for your closet and reshaping habits to reconnect with what makes you, you.

Whering is your wardrobe’s search engine, stylist and shopping sense‑check built into one, finding outfit inspiration from what you already own and future‑proofing purchases before they ever hit your wardrobe.

DIGITAL WARDROBE & ORGANISATION

Your closet, no limits.
Curate your wardrobe in seconds.
Add clothes from our database of over 100 million items.
Add images directly from retailer websites.
Add your own photos – we’ll remove the background.
Download our Chrome Extension and digitise as you go.
See everything you own in one place – it’s your wardrobe in your hands.

SEE AND STYLE MILLIONS OF WARDROBES

Inspiration evolved.
See friends’ wardrobes – or connect with new ones.
Add items directly from any other wardrobe to yours.
Create and share outfits with friends using style submissions.
Add friends’ outfits to your Moodboards for non‑stop inspiration.
See and save outfits created by those who know your style.
Save items from your friends’ wishlist to yours in one click.

DISCOVER YOUR STYLE WITH DATA‑DRIVEN INSIGHTS

Your wardrobe – powered by analytics.
Cost‑Per‑Wear: True ROI—spot your best investments.
Wear Rate: Track how often you rock each piece.
Intake Tracking: Log new vs. pre‑loved buys and monitor your shift to sustainable style.
Colour Palette: See your go‑to hues and gaps.
Wardrobe Longevity: Measure item lifespan, track net additions, and retire under‑loved pieces responsibly.

PERSONAL STYLING AND OUTFIT PLANNING

Style is personal and our outfits are too.
Shuffle your wardrobe with our Clueless‑inspired outfit creator “Dress Me”.
Get creative and save all your outfits in one place – never forget a good look.
Lacking inspiration? Get a Style Pass and try our Outfit Maker.
Start outfit planning for events in the Whering outfit planner to always feel your best.
Create lookbooks to categorise and organise all your outfits.
Save the time and stress of deciding what to wear.

PACKING AND TRAVEL OUTFIT PLANNING

Travel ready, stress free.
Avoid overpacking, baggage fees and forgetful packing with Whering Packing Lists.
Never miss an essential with smart reminders.
Shop your own wardrobe to curb impulse buys.

WISHLISTS & MOODBOARDS

Your style, your way.
Wishlists: Save and curate all of the clothes you want in one place.
Moodboards: Collect all your style inspiration in one spot.

WHO WE ARE

Digital Wardrobe · Wardrobe Organisation · Virtual Closet · Personal Styling · Outfit Planner · Outfit Maker · Outfit Generator · AI Fashion Assistant · Style Analytics · Wardrobe Management · Capsule Wardrobe · Sustainable Fashion · Second‑Hand Shopping · Clueless Wardrobe · Packing Travel List · Fashion Wishlist · Fashion Moodboard · Style Community · Clothing Inventory · Cost‑Per‑Wear Tracking
